thread.title: USM offering telehealth services on Gulf Park campus -
thread.title_full: USM offering telehealth services on Gulf Park campus - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: USM offering telehealth services on Gulf Park campus -
text:
LONG BEACH, Miss. (AP) - University of Southern Mississippi's Gulf Park campus in Long Beach is now offering students and employees health care from doctors on the school's Hattiesburg campus.
The service will be through a telehealth connection maintained by the Center for Telehealth at the University of Mississippi Medical Center.
The Sun Herald reports ( http://bit.ly/1ZE8Bar ) USM is the first university in Mississippi to offer the service, which has increasingly become an option nationwide for clinics in rural areas or locations where access to doctors is scarce.
The telehealth system allows patients at the Southern Miss Health Center in Long Beach to get health care information, in real time, via a webcam connection from a physician with Student Health Services based in Hattiesburg.
Information from: The Sun Herald, http://www.sunherald.com
